item.title: National spotlight shines on NYC mayoral race as voters make final decisions
item.description: All eyes are on New York City as Election Day arrives, marking the final opportunity for voters to weigh in on the high-stakes mayoral race.

item.title: 'Highly volatile' threat landscape for November elections, new assessment finds
item.description: Voters head to the polls this fall amid the "highest levels of political violence in the U.S. since the 1970s," a new assessment found.
